channel.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom
channel.description: This podcast touches various things such as Skepticism, Science, Magic and any Random Annoyances i encounter. Give it whirl!

item.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom Episode 5
item.author: skepticofdoom@hotmail.co.uk
item.description: In this podcast i talk about some chaplaincy cuts that were featured in the Chad my local paper, we do a thought experiment which meanders off into randomness and i plug Pete Firman in Nottingham.

item.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom Episode 4
item.author: skepticofdoom@hotmail.co.uk
item.description: In this Podcast i talk mainly about cool stuff happening around the Midlands to do with Skeptical Events such as QED and SITP events. Nice and short. My laptop has been dead a while so sorry about the lack of stuff. Check my blog lhymas.wordpress.com

item.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom Episode 3
item.author: skepticofdoom@hotmail.co.uk
item.description:
In this episode i talk mainly about homeopathy and about a man in a coma, which came first the chicken or the egg and other bits and bobs.
Check my blog lhymas.wordpress.com

item.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom Episode 2
item.author: skepticofdoom@hotmail.co.uk
item.description:
This is the second podcast from the Skeptic Podcast Of Doom.
In this i talk about a sea monster and homeopathy and other such nonsense.
Check my blog lhymas.wordpress.com

item.title: The Skeptic Podcast Of Doom Episode 1/Test
item.author: skepticofdoom@hotmail.co.uk
item.description:
This podcast is my first and therefore being the introduction to me.
I still need a decent theme tune which should be sorted soon and hopefully next time i will be more organised and less nervous.
